name: Mackay Alexis
description: o say about me except that I am calm, honest, kind, loyal, gentle, cheerful, optimistic, romantic, I am very understanding, open minded with a heart to forgive with sense of humor. I love being around with my woman because she is my closest companion. I love taking my woman to the beach where we could hold hands and share intimate moments together. I also love picnicking. Special spots where i can be with my woman alone where we will seem to be the only humans on the earth. I love seafood, my hobbies include music, Picnicking, Petting my woman, swimming.I have a free mind and sometimes i get hurt because some people take advantage of my free nature. I seek a serious long lasting relationship.
